sourcesContent:
import * as yup from 'yup';

export const PaperSchema = yup.object().shape({
    accept: 
     yup.bool()
      .test(
        'accept',
        'You have to agree with our Terms and Conditions!',
        value => value === true
      )
    ,
    technicalpaper_filename: yup.string()
        .required('Required'),
    author_notes: yup.string()
    .max(3, 'too many words')
    .required('Required'),
    copyright: yup.bool().oneOf([true], 'Field must be checked')
});
